segments.text: How many ports do we call at on our passage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The ship is going very fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps she makes about 25 knots an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You look pale . Are you seasick ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have some tablets for seasickness .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They give me no help at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then we'd better go back to our cabin .
segments.speaker: S1
